name: Army Cargo Truck Parking
description:
This game is artistically designed for army cargo transport lovers. Stop your searching now because this is a turbo military truck and military jeep driving simulation game. Everyone dreams that he become a hero for his nation so this is the time for you to become a real frontline command solider.

There are many levels in this game and you face different weather environments like smoke, snow on mountains, and dryness in desserts. Jungle and mountain also on your roads where are many dangerous animals like lion, dinosaur and wild dogs so be careful. When you reached on last point unload your truck and pick up the injured solders.

Show your ultra driving skills on narrow roads. Your little mistake could get you and your fellow soldiers in death. So clean your mind and concentrate on roads because roads are damaged. Don’t drop the load and complete your task in given time.

This game is for all gender and all age peoples. So don’t wait download and play this subway truck driving sim game.

Features:
• Beautiful high power 4x4 Army Trucks.
• Ultra realistic endless driving environment.
• Addictive levels & game physics.
• Realistic vehicles
• Time based levels.
• HD quality graphics.
• Realistic animated people.
• Energy boosting game sound.
• Cab view with side mirrors.
• Different camera views: up & behind, driver view, near the wheel.
• Smooth steering control with hydraulic break and acceleration paddle.
• On-screen brake pedals, acceleration, transmission and steering control.
• Totally free of cost game.

Note:
This free game is supported by advertisement Ads within the App.
